member.name: M:Codeless.SharePoint.ObjectModel.SPContentTypeAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs an instance of with a full or partial content type ID. If content type ID supplied is partial, it must be in the form of 32 consecutive characters of hexadecimal numerics (0-9, A-F). When the full content type ID is being resolved, the value will be concatenated to the resolved content type ID of the base class with the content type ID separator "00". If the base class is , "0x01" is assumed to be the parent content type ID.
member.param: Full or partial content type ID.

member.name: M:Codeless.SharePoint.ObjectModel.SPContentTypeAttribute.#ctor(System.UInt16,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs an instance of with a two-digit partial content type ID. When the full content type ID is being resolved, the value will be formatted as a two-digit hexadecimal number an concatenated to the resolved content type ID of the base class. If the base class is , "0x01" is assumed to be the parent content type ID.
member.param: A two-byte integer value which will be formatted as a two-digit hexadecimal number.
member.exception: Throws when equals to zero.

member.name: M:Codeless.SharePoint.ObjectModel.SPContentTypeAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs an instance of with a parent content type ID and a partial content type ID. When the full content type ID is being resolved, the two content type ID will be concatenated with with the content type ID separator "00".

member.name: M:Codeless.SharePoint.ObjectModel.SPContentTypeAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.UInt16,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs an instance of with a parent content type ID and a partial content type ID. When the full content type ID is being resolved, the value will be formatted as a two-digit hexadecimal number an concatenated to the parent content type ID specified.
member.param: A two-byte integer value which will be formatted as a two-digit hexadecimal number.

member.name: M:Codeless.SharePoint.PrincipalInfo.CreatePrincipalContextScope
member.summary: Creates a resolvation scope that resolved identities are cached until the object is disposed. Same identity referenced by different SharePoint users are returned once only, even by subsequent calls to or . If no scope is created before calling or , an implicit scope is created during the call and is disposed after the call.
member.returns: A disposable object.

member.summary: Enumerates identities referenced by the specified SharePoint user or group, and optionally throw exception when error is encountered. If is set to *false*, a object that is set to *true* is returned when error is encountered. To eliminate duplication on subequent calls, first call .

Whether to throw exception when error is encountered.
member.returns: A enumerable object containing resolved identities.
